translation.en: [voice trembling] We were always there for each other
translation.fr: On a toujours été là l'une pour l'autre,

translation.en: The war between our families will be bloody.
translation.fr: La guerre entre nos famillessera sanglante.

translation.en: And no one will emerge victorious from it.
Lots of bad things have happened,
but it would be good for us to forget about this, uh…
I should have said, "after this tragedy."
She wouldn't be happy… seeing you crying.
translation.fr: Elle ne voudrait pas te voir pleurer.

translation.en: Look, I'll tell you one time, and I won't say it again.
translation.fr: Je vais le dire une fois.Je ne me répéterai pas.

translation.en: [Massimo] This is Sicily. It's my territory.
You will never step a foot in here again.
translation.fr: Ne remettez plus jamais les pieds ici.

translation.en: I will make sure of it.
I will turn your ridiculous island into a graveyard.
translation.fr: je ferai un cimetièrede votre île ridicule.

translation.en: [in Italian] Tell them to get the fuck out of here. Now.
The doctor said that it's too soon.
I don't care what the doctor said.
I know how I feel, and I know what I need.
translation.fr: Je sais comment je me senset ce qu'il me faut.

translation.en: And it's definitely not lying in a bed and feeling sorry for myself.
translation.fr: Je refuse de rester allongéeà m'apitoyer sur mon sort.

translation.en: [sighs] What is it with you and resting?
translation.fr: Arrêtez de parler de repos, tous.

translation.en: I've had enough rest to last me a lifetime.
I'm tired of lying in bed and having you baby me.
translation.fr: J'en ai assez de rester couchéeà me faire dorloter.

translation.en: [in English] Raquel, please bring us a bottle of wine.
translation.fr: Raquel, apporte-nous une bouteille de vin.

translation.en: [in Polish] That's hardcore. It's not even 11:00 yet.
translation.fr: Carrément. Il n'est même pas 11 h.

translation.en: Need I remind you that you almost died?
-Getting drunk at breakfast is a bad idea. -For fuck's sake.
translation.fr: et tu te saoules au petit-déj ? C'est bon, putain.

translation.en: Why does everyone suddenly think they know what I need?
translation.fr: Tout le monde croit savoirmes besoins et désirs.

translation.en: Do you have any idea what we've been through?
translation.fr: Tu te rends comptede ce qu'on a traversé ?

translation.en: I've never been so afraid of losing you.
translation.fr: Je n'ai jamais eu aussi peur de te perdre.
Son cœur a bien failli se briser.

translation.en: Olo, I know how hard it was for you and I know you're worried about me,
translation.fr: Je sais que ça a été dur pour toiet que tu t'es inquiétée,

translation.en: but I've been given a second chance.
I want to make the most of it.
Besides, we haven't even toasted to you changing your mind about marriage.
translation.fr: Et on n'a pas encore trinquéà ta nouvelle foi en le mariage.
Je suis heureuse que tu sois là.

translation.en: [in Polish] I can't look at that hair sober.
translation.fr: Je ne supporte pas ta coiffure, sobre.

translation.en: [in English] Uh, hello, Giuseppe? Can we fix hair today?
translation.fr: Allô, Giuseppe ? Tu peux nous coiffer aujourd'hui ?

translation.en: Right now? Okay. Let's go. Let's go.
translation.fr: Tout de suite ? D'accord. On y va !
Je ne voulais pas te déranger.

translation.en: Could you come and see me when you're done?
translation.fr: Viens me voir quand tu auras fini.

translation.en: [in Polish] Wow. So you're ready to go, then.
And what makes you say that? You're not wearing any panties.
translation.fr: - Pourquoi tu dis ça ?- Tu n'as pas de culotte.

translation.en: But that's not the only thing.
So what? We bumped into each other-- "And I fucked him."
translation.fr: - Je suis tombée sur lui…- "Et je l'ai baisé."

translation.en: Listen, I want to hear every kinky little detail, got it?
translation.fr: Je veux savoirtous les détails croustillants.

translation.en: Quit smirking and come help me, or we'll never get out the door.
translation.fr: Arrête de sourire et aide-moi.On doit partir.

translation.en: I've already got everything picked out. Here.
translation.fr: J'ai tout choisi pour toi. Voilà.
- Qu'est-ce que tu fais ?- Allez, raconte.

translation.en: Did you tell Massimo we were going out?
He doesn't tell me when he goes out. Fuck. Well, this is gonna be interesting!
translation.fr: - Il ne me dit rien quand il sort.- Ça va être intéressant !

translation.en: -Come on, really? This place? -What's the big deal?
translation.fr: Sérieux ? Ici ? Tous les bons restos en villeappartiennent aux Torricelli.

translation.en: All the good restaurants in town belong to the Torricellis.
translation.fr: Tous les bons restos en villeappartiennent aux Torricelli.

translation.en: [groans] Now, that's what I call a food baby.
translation.fr: J'ai trop mangé, regarde mon ventre.
Encore plus de corps à aimer.

translation.en: Where did you get my number?
You know… I am who I am.
translation.fr: Tu sais… Je suis qui je suis.
Parce que je n'arrive pas à t'oublier.

translation.en: -[waiter, in Italian] How was everything? -Great. Thanks.
Olo, sometimes the truth is complicated.
translation.fr: La vérité n'est pas toujours facile.

translation.en: Lari, what happened on that island?
translation.fr: Laura, que s'est-il passé sur cette île ?

translation.en: I ran away with him after Massimo cheated with Anna.
translation.fr: Je l'ai suivi quand Massimo m'a trompée.

translation.en: Hold on. I thought that was a plot against Massimo.
translation.fr: Je croyaisque c'était un complot contre Massimo.

translation.en: [Laura] It was, but I didn't know it at the time.
Nacho was like my… best friend.
[Olga] Seriously? You saw the guy twice, and now he's your best friend?
translation.fr: C'était ton meilleur amiaprès l'avoir vu deux fois ?

translation.en: Whatever. I'm not here to lecture you.
translation.fr: Je ne vais pas te sermonner.

translation.en: But he was there for me when my whole world was falling apart.
translation.fr: Il était làquand mon monde s'est effondré.

translation.en: He took care of me, and I felt free.
translation.fr: Il s'est occupé de moi.Je me suis sentie libre.

translation.en: I have to forget about him.
[sighs] You're in love with him. Don't be ridiculous. He's just some guy.
translation.fr: - Tu es tombée amoureuse.- N'importe quoi. C'est qu'un mec.

translation.en: -♪ Just vibe on my danger… ♪ -Since when do you go out without me?
translation.fr: Depuis quand tu sors sans moi ?

translation.en: A little, before Domenico almost killed Olga with his tongue.
translation.fr: Un peu, avant que Domenicon'attaque Olga avec sa langue.
Je n'y arrive pas, sans toi.

translation.en: [Laura] Baby, I think that you are drunk, and, um…
Maybe we can talk about this another time?
You'd like to know what happened? Your ex shot me.
translation.fr: Tu sais ce qui s'est passé ?Ton ex m'a tiré dessus.

translation.en: What happened between you and Matos?
translation.fr: Que s'est-il passé entre toi et Matos ?

translation.en: You ran away with him when you thought that I was cheating on you with Anna.
translation.fr: Tu t'es enfuie avec lui,pensant que je te trompais.

translation.en: It would've never happened if you'd told me about your twin brother!
translation.fr: Ça ne serait pas arrivési tu m'avais parlé de ton jumeau.

translation.en: That twin brother that told me that you were pregnant?
translation.fr: Celui qui m'a dit que tu étais enceinte ?

translation.en: I wanted to protect the family, and I knew what you would do
translation.fr: Je voulais protéger la famille. Je devais te cacherque j'avais perdu un bébé dans l'accident.

translation.en: if you found out that I'd lost the baby in the accident.
translation.fr: Je devais te cacherque j'avais perdu un bébé dans l'accident.

translation.en: I didn't want to be the cause of another war.
translation.fr: Je ne voulais pas causer une autre guerre.

translation.en: no right to hide it from me.
translation.fr: Tu n'avais pas le droit de me cacher ça.

translation.en: It was our baby, who died because of your enemies.
translation.fr: Notre bébé, mort à cause de tes ennemis.

translation.en: I think I have a hangover.
I think you're hiding something from me.

translation.fr: On fera la revanche plus tard.

translation.en: And you're just telling me this now?
translation.fr: Et tu me dis ça maintenant ?

translation.en: No. Fix this today. I don't give a shit.
translation.fr: Tu vas résoudre ce problèmeaujourd'hui. Je m'en fous.
Giuseppe a foutu le bordel, comme d'hab.

translation.en: I've known you my entire life.
These kinds of things never get to you.
translation.fr: Ces choses ne te contrarient pas.

translation.en: Either you're getting old, or something else is up.
translation.fr: Soit tu vieillis,soit il se passe autre chose.

translation.en: I will be in the atelier today. Please expect me.
translation.fr: Je vais passer à l'atelier aujourd'hui.

translation.en: [in Polish] Hey! Why the hell are you in such a hurry?
translation.fr: Tu peux me direpourquoi tu es si pressée ?

translation.en: My marriage is falling apart, so I'm focusing on my career. Now, come on!
translation.fr: Mon mariage bat de l'aile,alors je me concentre sur ma carrière.

translation.en: That's great, but do we really have to walk this much?
translation.fr: D'accord, mais tu es vraiment obligéed'y aller à pied ?

translation.en: -[in English] I like those colors. -I know, but that's too fancy.
translation.fr: - J'aime ces couleurs.- C'est trop sophistiqué.

translation.en: That's Michele, but he's very moody.
translation.fr: C'est Michel, mais il est très lunatique.

translation.en: Laura, do you realize how much work we still have?
translation.fr: Laura, tu te rends comptede la quantité de travail qui nous reste ?

translation.en: Yeah, and this is so perfect because, you know, I will keep my head busy.
translation.fr: Oui et c'est parfait, ça va m'occuper l'esprit.

translation.en: Got it! What about this one?
-My little… -I'll call you. Bye. Love you.
[in Polish] The photographer needs to be tall and handsome.
Plus, if the photos are from below, it'll look like we have double chins,
translation.fr: Pas de photos d'en dessous, ça nous fera un double menton,et c'est inacceptable.
ça nous fera un double menton,et c'est inacceptable.

translation.en: Just like this. Click, click, click.
Okay, fine. He can be short and handsome, but he's gonna need a ladder.
translation.fr: Il peut être petit et beau,mais il lui faudra une échelle.

translation.en: And then I'll plop my bare ass right on the cake.
translation.fr: Et je vais mettre mon cul nulsur le gâteau.

translation.en: Shit, you're not listening to me.
What kind of photographer do I want?
One with his ass in the cake.
translation.fr: Avec le cul dans le gâteau.

translation.en: I'll catch up with you later.
-♪ Fuck society ♪ -[Massimo, in English] On your knees.
[in English] I didn't know you were coming early today.
translation.fr: Je ne savais pasque tu venais tôt aujourd'hui.

translation.en: I guess I'll have benefits from it, yeah?
translation.fr: Je vais en tirer profit aussi, alors.

translation.en: [in Polish] Did you see the email? Go on, read it!
translation.fr: Tu as lu le mail ? Lis-le !

translation.en: [in English] Hey, girls, it's only 9:00 a.m., and you're already drunk.
translation.fr: Les filles, il est 9 het vous êtes déjà bourrées.

translation.en: [restrained] Um, yeah, because we're going to Lagos Fashion Fair.
translation.fr: Parce qu'on vaà la semaine de la mode de Lagos.
- À la semaine de la mode.- Oui.

translation.en: Sorry, I couldn't leave amore mio with a hard-on.
translation.fr: Je ne pouvais pasquitter amore mio avec la trique.

translation.en: And now… what happens in Lagos stays in Lagos!
translation.fr: Et ce qui arrive à Lagos, reste à Lagos !

translation.en: -They were in the villa the entire time? -The whole day, why?
translation.fr: - Ils étaient à la villa ?- Toute la journée. Pourquoi ?

translation.en: He didn't even come to say goodbye?
translation.fr: Il ne t'a pas dit au revoir ?

translation.en: I don't think we can fix this.
translation.fr: On ne pourra pas arranger ça.

translation.en: Are you trying to fucking scare me to death?
You're going out drinking with me in this?
translation.fr: Tu sors avec moi comme ça ?

translation.en: We've got a big meeting tomorrow. I want to rest.
translation.fr: Je veux me reposeravant la réunion de demain.

translation.en: -Weren't you the one talking about change? -Watch me.
translation.fr: - Tu voulais du changement, non ?- Regarde ce que je vais faire.

translation.en: -"I'm back from the dead!" -Look at me. I'm lying down.
-Wait, what was it you said? -[Laura] I'm beginning to live.
translation.fr: - Comment tu as dit ?- Je commence à vivre.

translation.en: What a poet. Shame you don't practice what you preach.
translation.fr: Quelle poète.Mais c'est des paroles en l'air.

translation.en: -Get up! I'm not sitting around all day! -Ola, no!
translation.fr: - Debout ! Je vais pas rester là !- Olga, non !
- Tu as une minute !- Tu es folle.

translation.en: [in Polish] Hey, the view's pretty good down here.

translation.fr: Sa planche est pas mal non plus.

translation.en: How can you be that into messing up your hair in the waves?
translation.fr: En quoi c'est marrantd'aller foirer ta coiffure dans l'eau ?

translation.en: It's just you and the water.
What are you, a surfing guru? Have you ever even stood on a board?
translation.fr: Tu es le gourou du surf ?Tu t'es déjà mise debout ?

translation.en: Except I spent most of my time in the water.
[announcer, in English] Now give it up for our champion, Marcelo Nacho Matos!
translation.fr: Mesdames et messieurs,applaudissez notre champion, Marcelo Nacho Matos !

translation.en: -Are you crazy? We just got here. -We have to leave now.
translation.fr: - Ça va pas ? On vient d'arriver.- Maintenant.

translation.en: The guy who got me from the ball. He can't see me.
translation.fr: Celui avec qui je suis partie.Il ne doit pas me voir.
- Il est avec une nana.- Quelle nana ?

translation.en: -That's his sister Amelia. -You met his sister?
translation.fr: - Sa sœur Amelia.- Tu connais sa sœur ?

translation.en: -What about his mom? Grandma too? -Stop it.
-Olo, I have to get out of here. -I'll shield you with my body.
translation.fr: - Je dois partir.- Vas-y, je te cache.

translation.en: [in English] I love surfing, so, so much!
[in Polish] I don't fucking believe it!
Now tell me everything. I want every little detail.
Where? Hey, Lari. Let's go to the bar.
translation.fr: Où ça ? Laura, allons au bar.

translation.en: [in English] One cold beer, served by a hot bartender, please.
translation.fr: Une bière fraîcheservie par un barman sexy.

translation.en: The best local beer for the gorgeous friend.
translation.fr: La meilleure bière localepour toi, beauté.

translation.en: [in Polish] Well, Olo, that beer goes really well with your dress.
translation.fr: Olga, cette bière va bien avec ta robe.

translation.en: I've been classy for over an hour now. This is long overdue. [laughs]
translation.fr: Je suis élégante depuis une heure.Ça suffit comme ça.

translation.en: -[in English] One glass of champagne. -[bartender] Sure.
Hi, I'm Maria. We wrote to each other. Nice to meet you.
Uh, it's a pleasure. But please, call me Laura.
Okay, Laura. I'll show you around and introduce you to a few people.
translation.fr: Laura, je vais vous présenterquelques personnes.
- Une autre bière.- Venez, s'il vous plaît.

translation.en: [in Polish] Let go of me, for fuck's sake! What the hell is this?
Oh my God. And that dress! Where is this from?
translation.fr: Et cette robe ! Elle vient d'où ?

translation.en: Um, it's from my new collection. Actually, the first one.
translation.fr: C'est ma nouvelle collection. La première.

translation.en: When I'm gonna be back in shape, I'm gonna become your most faithful client, I swear.
translation.fr: Quand j'aurai retrouvé la ligne,je serai ta meilleure cliente !

translation.en: [Amelia] I think you would look great in it.
[Olga, in Polish] Let go of me!
[Olga grunts] Vittorio, listen. I'll go to my room by my own.
translation.fr: Vittorio, écoute. Je veux retournerà ma chambre toute seule.

translation.en: [Vittorio] Mrs. Torricelli told me to lock you in your room.
translation.fr: Mme Torricelli m'a ditde vous enfermer dans votre chambre.

translation.en: [in English] Go. [in Polish] Mrs. Tortellini can kiss my ass!
I'm glad to see you in good shape. I was really worried about you.
translation.fr: Contente que tu ailles bien. J'étais tellement inquiète.

translation.en: But you know, not only me.
You know, my brother was like a shadow of a man.
translation.fr: Mon frère n'était que l'ombre de lui-même.

translation.en: Laura, you know he's not a bad person, right?
translation.fr: Laura, tu sais que c'est un homme bien.

translation.en: He's just loyal to his father.
It doesn't justify the way he treated me.
I know. And when I found out what he had done, I didn't talk to him, like, for a week.
translation.fr: Quand j'ai su ce qu'il avait fait,je lui ai fait la tête une semaine.

translation.en: I know he hurt you deeply.
translation.fr: Je sais qu'il t'a fait du mal.

translation.en: But believe me, he has learned a very painful lesson.
translation.fr: Mais crois-moi, il a appris sa leçon.

translation.en: -Shut up! What are you doing? -[Olga] Oh! I want to sleep!
translation.fr: La ferme !Vous faites quoi ? Je veux dormir !

translation.en: Hello, my dear friend! Do you have a local beer?
translation.fr: Bonjour, l'ami !Vous avez une bière locale ?

translation.en: [man] Shut up! I want to sleep!
[whining] She's out there getting laid, and she locks me away in a hotel room.
translation.fr: Elle est partie baiseret elle m'enferme dans ma chambre.

translation.en: Without a single drop of alcohol!
[sighs] There we go. There we go.
[in English] Hello! Do you hear me? Can you help me, please?
Mrs. Olga, please! Back to your room! I must go to Mrs. Torricelli!
translation.fr: Mme Olga, retournez dans la chambre !Je dois aller chercher Mme Torricelli !

translation.en: What is wrong with you? I want to go to the party right now!
translation.fr: Ça va pas, non ?Je veux aller faire la fête !

translation.en: [in English] How could you do this to me?
translation.fr: Comment tu as pu me faire ça ?

translation.en: Everything was so perfect until you showed up.
translation.fr: Tout était parfait avant que tu n'arrives.

translation.en: -♪ I'm crying to the stars ♪ -[softly] I think I'm in love with you.

translation.fr: J'ai quelque chose à te montrer.

translation.en: You can run away from me…
but you can't run away from what you feel.
translation.fr: Mais tu ne peux pas fuirce que tu ressens.

translation.en: How do you know what I feel?
translation.fr: Et tu sais ce que je ressens ?

translation.en: Your body is a worse liar than you are.
translation.fr: Ton corps ment encore moins bien que toi.

translation.en: [softly] I need to go back to the hotel.
You've already lost your way once.
translation.fr: Tu t'es déjà perdu une fois.

translation.en: I will give you time, Little Bee.
Even for the rest of my life.
translation.fr: Toute ma vie, s'il le faut.

translation.en: Maybe you will have to wait forever.
You think that I want only--
translation.fr: Tu crois que je ne veux que…
Je ne te ferai jamais de mal.

translation.en: I want to watch it forever.
translation.fr: Je veux te voir jouir pour toujours.

translation.en: For sure, Massimo got mad because he wasn't able to track me.
translation.fr: Massimo doit être en colèrede ne pas avoir pu me suivre.

translation.en: If you don't want to, you don't have to go back.
translation.fr: Tu n'es pas obligée d'y retournersi tu ne veux pas.

translation.en: It would be the easiest way. But at this moment, I--
translation.fr: Ce serait le plus facile.Mais à ce moment précis…
Je ne suis pas comme lui.

translation.en: I won't force you to do anything.
translation.fr: Je ne te forcerai à rien.

translation.en: You will always have a choice.
That's why I saved his life.
translation.fr: C'est pour ça que je lui ai sauvé la vie.
- Il ne t'a pas dit…- Quoi ?

translation.en: When Anna shot you instead of Massimo, she tried to shoot him again.
translation.fr: Après t'avoir tiré dessus,Anna a essayé de tuer Massimo.

translation.en: I didn't allow it. I killed her.
translation.fr: Mais je l'en ai empêchée. Je l'ai tuée.
Tu as sauvé la vie de Massimo.

translation.en: I don't want my happiness at the cost of your suffering.
translation.fr: Je ne veux pas être heureuxau prix de ta souffrance.

translation.en: I want you to want me.
translation.fr: Je veux que tu me choisisses.

translation.en: It would be easier for you.
translation.fr: Ce serait plus facile pour toi.

translation.en: Bee, you don't have to be with me because you don't have another choice.
translation.fr: Bébé, je ne veux pas que tu sois avec moi,car tu n'as pas d'autre choix.

translation.en: I want you to choose life with me.
translation.fr: Je veux que tu en aies envie.

translation.en: I will wait for you… until you're ready.
I went for a walk, to think.
translation.fr: Je me suis promenée pour réfléchir.

translation.en: I'm one step away from asking you for a divorce.
translation.fr: Je suis à deux doigtsde demander le divorce.

translation.en: I'm talking to you. I'm talking to you.
When I got shot, our relationship almost died with me.
translation.fr: Quand on m'a tiré dessus,notre couple en est presque mort.

translation.en: I was trying to save it, and you, you were speculating
translation.fr: Je voulais nous sauver, mais toi, tu tourbillonnaisdans ton monde de soupçons.

translation.en: and diving into your dark limbo, which I was not allowed to enter.
translation.fr: mais toi, tu tourbillonnaisdans ton monde de soupçons. Tu m'as repoussée.

translation.en: Now I'm in my own limbo.
translation.fr: À mon tour d'avoir des doutes.

translation.en: I don't know what I want, but I'm alone there.
translation.fr: J'ignore ce que je veux,mais je suis seule.

translation.en: And I need space to find out what I feel.
translation.fr: J'ai besoin d'espacepour savoir ce que je ressens.

translation.en: This white shit has replaced me.
I'm going to sleep in Olga's room tonight.
translation.fr: Je dormirai dans la chambre d'Olga.

translation.en: And I expect you to leave for Sicily tomorrow to give me the time and space I need.
translation.fr: Repars pour la Sicile demainpour me donner l'espace dont j'ai besoin.

translation.en: And do not think of following me.
The plane is to your disposal.
You managed to lock this tiger in a cage.
translation.fr: Tu as réussi à mettre un tigre en cage.

translation.en: Have you completely lost your fucking mind?
You've gone crazy for some dick you hardly know
translation.fr: Tu perds la tête pour un inconnu

translation.en: just because he makes you wet?
translation.fr: juste parce qu'il te fait mouiller ?

translation.en: Well? Are you going to break up your marriage and family for him?
translation.fr: Tu vas détruire ton mariageet ta famille pour lui ?

translation.en: You haven't married Domenico yet, and you're already acting like a Torricelli.
translation.fr: Tu n'as pas encore épousé Domenicoet tu parles comme une Torricelli.

translation.en: Spare me the bullshit about family loyalty.
translation.fr: Épargne-moi les conneriessur la loyauté familiale.

translation.en: What am I supposed to do?
Wait until Massimo deals with his shit and remembers I'm his wife?
translation.fr: Attendre que Massimo gère ses émotionset se souvienne qu'il a une femme ?

translation.en: Who are you looking out for? Me or yourself?
translation.fr: À qui tu penses ? À moi ou à toi ?

translation.en: I have to figure out what I really want.
translation.fr: Je dois réfléchir à ce que je veux.

translation.en: I'm sorry I didn't ask how you're feeling, or if you need anything.
translation.fr: J'aurais dû te demandercomment tu allais.

translation.en: I want you to be happy.
translation.fr: Je veux que tu sois heureuse.

translation.en: Whatever you decide, I'll support you. You hear me?
translation.fr: Quoi que tu décides, je te soutiendrai.

translation.en: Remember, just say the word, and I'll fucking kill both of them.
translation.fr: Je les tue tous les deux, si tu veux.

translation.en: And I'll find you a nice, calm guy from a village near Radom, okay?
translation.fr: Je te trouverai un mec calme et sympad'un village près de Radom.

translation.en: You'll grow old and die of boredom.

translation.fr: Laura, il s'est passé quelque chose ?

translation.en: You came here on a motorcycle?
You're gonna give me a heart attack.
translation.fr: Tu vas me faire faire une attaque.

translation.en: You know how much I hate your escapades.
Happy to see you too, Mom.
translation.fr: Contente de te voir aussi, maman.

translation.en: Come in. I've got some pork chops.
Of course, you never call ahead.
You could have told me you were coming.
translation.fr: Tu aurais pu nous appeler,nous dire que tu venais.

translation.en: I always have to think on my feet.
What do you mean? Nothing's going on. I'm just here to visit you.
translation.fr: Rien du tout.Je suis venue voir mes parents.

translation.en: Your mom is convinced that people buy motorcycles
translation.fr: Ta mère penseque les gens achètent des motos

translation.en: when they're going through some kind of crisis.
If you were okay, you'd be spending your birthday with your husband,
translation.fr: Si tout allait bien, tu passeraiston anniversaire avec ton mari

translation.en: celebrating the anniversary of your first meeting.
-As far as I know-- -I'm in love with someone else.
translation.fr: - Que je sache…- J'en aime un autre.

translation.en: But we agreed that we wouldn't smoke anymore.
translation.fr: Je croyais qu'on ne fumait plus.

translation.en: Honey, if you weren't married to Massimo, who would you choose?
translation.fr: Si tu n'étais pas mariée à Massimo,qui choisirais-tu ?

translation.en: The problem is, I don't know.
When you have the answer, you'll know what to do.
translation.fr: Quand tu connaîtras la réponse,tu sauras quoi faire.

translation.en: [whispering] I'll tell you a little secret.
translation.fr: Je vais te dire un secret

translation.en: I think it's what's kept our marriage alive for 35 years.
translation.fr: qui a gardé notre mariage intactpendant 35 ans.

translation.en: Remember, a woman must be selfish in a relationship.
translation.fr: Une femme doit être égoïstedans un couple.

translation.en: If you put your own happiness first,
translation.fr: Si tu fais passer ton bonheur en premier,

translation.en: you'll do whatever it takes to make it last, right?
translation.fr: tu feras ce qu'il fautpour le faire durer.

translation.en: But it can't be a relationship that destroys you.
translation.fr: Mais ça doit être une relationqui ne te détruit pas.

translation.en: Remember that a woman who lives only for her man
translation.fr: Une femme qui ne vit que pour son homme

translation.en: And her man will be unhappy too.
Coffee for Dad. And for his daughter?
translation.fr: Café pour papa, et pour ma fille ?

translation.en: Sometimes I wish I was still that little girl
translation.fr: Parfois,je voudrais redevenir la petite fille

translation.en: you used to take out for lemonade.
translation.fr: que tu emmenais boire une limonade.

translation.en: You'll always be my little girl.
translation.fr: Tu seras toujours ma petite fille.

translation.en: I like spending time with you
translation.fr: J'aime passer du temps avec toi,

translation.en: because I can eat as much as I want and not feel guilty.
translation.fr: je peux manger ce que je veuxsans culpabiliser.
- Pas comme avec maman.- Je sais.

translation.en: There are two things you never point out to a woman.
translation.fr: Il y a deux chosesdont on ne parle pas à une femme.

translation.en: Her age and the amount of food she eats.
translation.fr: Son âge et la quantité qu'elle mange.

translation.en: I never knew about the second one.
-You should. -Okay, I'll keep that in mind.
translation.fr: - Tu devrais le savoir.- Je m'en souviendrai.

translation.en: -Just a second. Olga won't stop calling. -Okay.
Hello. Answer my calls, or I'll have a heart attack.
translation.fr: Réponds à mes appels,je vais faire une attaque.

translation.en: You want to know what's up?
Massimo knows about everything, Lari. He knows about you and Nacho!
translation.fr: Massimo est au courant, Laura.Pour toi et Nacho !

translation.en: He's gonna kill you, me, and God knows who else!
translation.fr: Il va nous tueret Dieu sait qui d'autre.

translation.en: [whispering] No, I overheard him talking to Domenico.
translation.fr: Non, je l'ai entendu en parler à Domenico.

translation.en: Um, how did you know what they were talking about?
translation.fr: Comment tu sais ce dont ils parlaient ?

translation.en: But I was pissed off about not understanding, so I learned.
translation.fr: J'en avais marre de ne rien comprendre,alors j'ai appris.

translation.en: Maybe I'm not a fluent speaker, but I understand everything.
translation.fr: Je ne suis pas bilingue,mais je comprends tout.

translation.en: You know how to say, "Nacho fucked Laura"?
translation.fr: Tu sais dire :"Nacho a baisé Laura" ?

translation.en: I guess it's time to go back to Sicily.
translation.fr: Il faut que je rentre en Sicile.

translation.en: Are you fucking insane? He knows!
translation.fr: Tu es dingue ! Il sait tout !

translation.en: Shoot! Fuck knows what he's gonna do!
I'd rather him shoot himself than you or me.
translation.fr: Enfin, c'est plutôt lui qui va nous tuer.

translation.en: Olo, stop. There must be a reason he hasn't done anything about it yet.
translation.fr: Olga, s'il n'a encore rien fait,c'est qu'il a une bonne raison.

translation.en: Are you even listening to me? Massimo won't forgive cheating.
translation.fr: Tu m'écoutes ?Massimo ne pardonne pas l'infidélité.

translation.en: I'm not scared of my own husband. I won't hide from him.
translation.fr: Je n'ai pas peur de mon propre mari.Je ne vais pas me cacher.

translation.en: Do what you want. I'm working on… an escape plan.
translation.fr: Fais ce que tu veux. Je vais monter… un plan d'évacuation.

translation.en: Olo, relax. Have a cigarette, okay?
What the hell do you think I'm doing? I can't stop smoking!
translation.fr: C'est ce que je fais, bordel !Je fume en continu !

translation.en: Dad, I have to go back to Sicily.
translation.fr: Papa, je dois rentrer en Sicile.

translation.en: But first, let's go back to the table. I ordered some apple pie.
translation.fr: Mais retournons à table,j'ai commandé une tarte aux pommes.

translation.en: what did you not understand when I told you not to push me?
translation.fr: je vous avais ditde ne pas me mettre la pression.

translation.en: by coming here, I'm risking my life and also my father's life in business.
translation.fr: En venant ici, je risque ma vieet la vie et les affaires de mon père.

translation.en: We have a pact with Massimo not to enter his territory.
translation.fr: On a un pacte avec Massimo.On ne doit pas venir ici.

translation.en: because I needed to see you.
Hear me out, and then do what you want.
translation.fr: Écoute-moiet ensuite, fais ce que tu veux.

translation.en: Okay, Mr. Fabio Rossi. Let's go.
translation.fr: D'accord, M. Fabio Rossi. En route.

translation.en: You know the address. You used to work there as a gardener.
translation.fr: Tu connais l'adresse.Tu y as bossé comme jardinier.

translation.en: You wanted to tell me something.
translation.fr: Tu voulais me dire quelque chose.

translation.en: I want to be honest with you.
translation.fr: Je veux être honnête avec toi.

translation.en: I understand what it means to be best friends with your lover.
translation.fr: je sais ce que c'est d'êtremeilleur ami avec son amante.

translation.en: I didn't fall in love with you at first sight.
translation.fr: Je n'ai pas eu le coup de foudre.

translation.en: I came to like you first.
For the way you get angry… the way you squint your eyes.
translation.fr: Pour ta façon de te mettre en colère,de plisser les yeux.

translation.en: When you smile without a reason. [chuckles]

translation.fr: Quand tu te brosses les dents,

translation.en: I wanna discover new things with you. I wanna show you the sunrise in Burma.
translation.fr: Je veux découvrir des choses avec toi. Te montrer l'aube en Birmanie.

translation.en: I wanna meditate with you in Bali.
And get drunk with you in Tokyo.
translation.fr: Et boire avec toi à Tokyo.

translation.en: I know it sounds silly, but…
I have no idea when you became my world, Laura.
translation.fr: j'ignore quand tu es devenuetout mon monde, Laura.

translation.en: I can't live without this world, and I don't want to.
translation.fr: Je ne peux pas vivre sans ce monde, et je ne le veux pas.

translation.en: I don't know how to convince you.
translation.fr: Je ne sais pas comment te convaincre.

translation.en: I'm ready to give you everything.
translation.fr: Je suis prêt à tout te donner.
Tout ce que tu voudras de moi.

translation.en: Thank you for finding the courage to tell me all of this.
translation.fr: Merci d'avoir eule courage de me dire tout ça.

translation.en: But I also need to speak with Massimo.
I can't stay in that situation anymore.

translation.fr: j'ai besoin de plus de temps.

translation.en: Okay. I packed just one suitcase.
translation.fr: Je n'ai fait qu'une seule valise.

translation.en: I grabbed your stuff too. It'll be a quick escape.
translation.fr: J'ai pris tes affaires. On peut fuir vite.

translation.en: Why the fuck didn't you call or text?
translation.fr: Pourquoi tu ne m'as pas appelée ?

translation.en: I would've sent a driver for you.

translation.fr: Olga, mon chauffeur était très bien.

translation.en: Are you serious? Now's not the best time--
translation.fr: Sérieux ? Ce n'est pas le moment.

translation.en: Have you forgotten your husband's line of work? [inhales sharply]
translation.fr: Tu as oublié le métier de ton mari ?

translation.en: Why don't you bring him with you,
translation.fr: Tu n'as qu'à l'amener avec toi.

translation.en: and I'll look up how to send a dead body back to Poland?
translation.fr: Je vais voir commenttransporter un cadavre en Pologne.

translation.en: [in Polish] God, it's so sad. You're going to die on your birthday.
translation.fr: C'est trop triste. Tu vas mourirle jour de ton anniversaire.

translation.en: If you survive, I bought you a really nice bag.
translation.fr: Si tu survis,je t'ai acheté un beau sac.

translation.en: If something happens, I'll keep it.
translation.fr: Si tu meurs, je le garde.
Il est allé à la plage.
- Je vais aller le voir.- Vraiment ?

translation.en: We need to work things out.
translation.fr: Je dois gérer ça avec lui.

translation.en: And when I get back, we'll drink to my resurrection, okay?
translation.fr: À mon retour, on boiraà ma résurrection, d'accord ?

translation.en: -I'm doing this alone. -Oh yeah, alone. I'll stay here and wait.
translation.fr: - J'y vais seule.- Oui. Je t'attends ici.

translation.en: Lari will be okay on her own.
translation.fr: Laura va s'en sortir toute seule.

translation.en: This conversation will be much more difficult for me.
translation.fr: Cette conversation seraplus dure pour moi.

translation.en: I have to say it all now.
Otherwise, I'm afraid I'm never gonna be able to say it again.
translation.fr: Sinon, j'ai peurde ne jamais pouvoir le redire.
Cette époque a changé ma vie.

translation.en: Not only because I had you,
but also because I realized what I really want for myself.
translation.fr: et parce que j'ai réaliséce que je voulais pour moi-même.

translation.en: I didn't want to be bad.
translation.fr: Je ne voulais pas te heurter.
Je n'arrive pas à me pardonner

translation.en: that you didn't feel to come to me anymore after losing our baby.
translation.fr: le fait que tu n'aies pas pu me direqu'on avait perdu notre bébé…

translation.en: That you had to deal with it all alone,
translation.fr: et que tu aies dû gérer ça seule.

translation.en: So you knew everything about Nacho for a long time, didn't you?
translation.fr: Tu es au courant pour Nachodepuis longtemps, hein ?

translation.en: When I was a child, my dad used to read me a book.
translation.fr: Enfant, mon père me lisait un livre.

translation.en: I still remember one sentence, a little parable.
translation.fr: Je me souviens d'une phrase, une parabole.

translation.en: I didn't really understand it back then.
translation.fr: Je ne la comprenais pas, à l'époque.

translation.en: "If it comes back, it's yours forever."
translation.fr: "Si elle revient, elle est à toi.

translation.en: it was never meant to be."
Your dad was a wonderful father.
And you also will be, one day.
translation.fr: Tu seras un bon père, un jour.

translation.en: Subtitle translation by: Maja Konkolewska and Meredith Cannella
